title: Wear Time Circuit - Watch Face
summary: A watchface that displays a circuit board with animated flowing electrons!

description: UPDATE: Added support for Android Wear 2.0 with Complications! This is a custom watch face for watches running Android Wear that displays a circuit board with animated flowing electrons!Check out the animated preview here:https://moto360mockup.appspot.com/During normal operation, the watch face consumes minimal CPU (and therefore battery) by displaying a simple dot-matrix display clock. When you touch the watch face, the screen is illuminated to reveal the circuit with flowing electrons.The watch face supports both 12 and 24 hour formats and can optionally display the current date.Almost all settings are configurable directly on your watch. No need to pull your phone out of your pocket in order to change the settings!Configuration options:* Complications (on Android Wear 2.0 devices only) - Specify type, colors and position. * Time Format - Specify whether the time will be displayed in 12 or 24 hour format or will match how it is displayed by your phone.* Time Color - Select the color of the L.E.D. lights that are used to show the time in non-ambient mode.* Time Position - Slide the clock face up/down the screen to the desired location.* Date Format - Specify the display format of the date.* Date Position - Select the position for the date (Hidden / Above time / Below time or Custom).* Date Color - Select the color of the date when in non-ambient mode.* Background - Control the intensity of the background glow or disable it entirely.* Circuit Color - Select the color of the circuit wires.* Circuit Intensity - Specify the brightness of the circuit wires. Values range from 1 (dim) to 3 (bright).* Electron Intensity - Specify the brightness of the electrons. Values range from 1 (dim) to 3 (bright).* Electron Speed - Specify how fast the electrons travel along the circuit. Speed ranges from 1 (slow) to 4 (fast)* Electron Size - Specify the size of the electrons. Sizes range from 1 (small) to 4 (large)As you change these settings, you will see their effect immediately. IMPORTANT NOTE: This application is ONLY intended for devices running ANDROID WEAR (1.0 or 2.0)
descriptionHTML:
UPDATE: Added support for Android Wear 2.0 with Complications!

This is a custom watch face for watches running Android Wear that displays a circuit board with animated flowing electrons!

Check out the animated preview here:

https://moto360mockup.appspot.com/

During normal operation, the watch face consumes minimal CPU (and therefore battery) by displaying a simple dot-matrix display clock. When you touch the watch face, the screen is illuminated to reveal the circuit with flowing electrons.

The watch face supports both 12 and 24 hour formats and can optionally display the current date.

Almost all settings are configurable directly on your watch. No need to pull your phone out of your pocket in order to change the settings!

Configuration options:

* Complications (on Android Wear 2.0 devices only) - Specify type, colors and position.

* Time Format - Specify whether the time will be displayed in 12 or 24 hour format or will match how it is displayed by your phone.

* Time Color - Select the color of the L.E.D. lights that are used to show the time in non-ambient mode.

* Time Position - Slide the clock face up/down the screen to the desired location.

* Date Format - Specify the display format of the date.

* Date Position - Select the position for the date (Hidden / Above time / Below time or Custom).

* Date Color - Select the color of the date when in non-ambient mode.

* Background - Control the intensity of the background glow or disable it entirely.

* Circuit Color - Select the color of the circuit wires.

* Circuit Intensity - Specify the brightness of the circuit wires. Values range from 1 (dim) to 3 (bright).

* Electron Intensity - Specify the brightness of the electrons. Values range from 1 (dim) to 3 (bright).

* Electron Speed - Specify how fast the electrons travel along the circuit. Speed ranges from 1 (slow) to 4 (fast)

* Electron Size - Specify the size of the electrons. Sizes range from 1 (small) to 4 (large)

As you change these settings, you will see their effect immediately.


IMPORTANT NOTE: This application is ONLY intended for devices running ANDROID WEAR (1.0 or 2.0)
comments: Cannot use on Sony Watch 3 Despite installation on sony zl it doesn't get installed on watch 3 even though it is connected to my cell. I have bought this app and now its of no use as unavailable on my watch. Please help or refund the money.

Fan-Tas-Tic!  Blown away. My favourite settings are: Electron speed a little faster than default, and both Circuit Intensity & Electron Intensity one notch dimmer than default, and the date dragged down to the bottom of the screen as in the photos (use the Custom Date Position for this).

Coolest circuit watch app out! I was skeptical at first about it but after reading the reviews I gave it a chance! I love the customizable colors and circuit intensity... Only thing I would love to see on here is battery life for either the watch and/or phone... Other then that I love it!
Fix battery life Sucks alot of battery on moto 360.  30 minutes of being off the charger my battery went from 100% to 75%

The Ultimate EE Watch Face! Everyone I've shown this watch face to thinks it's so cool. These unique and imaginative watch faces are what Android Wear is all about. Go suck on my electrons Apple Watch!

Really like it! Elegant and simple. I would love to see different a regular digital font but that's just a suggestion. Also, an analog watch face with the animated circuit would be a really cool addition.
